item.title: Hugo site on Github with domain from Namecheap
item.description: A personal website to showcase personal projects is one of the most important things a computer science student should have when they are searching for a job. This tutorial will serve all those students that are not well-versed in web development and want an easy way to set up their website in a fast manner. Before Starting With this tutorial I’m assuming you have an IDE such as VS Codeor Sublimeand a version control system such as Git.
